docs.title: FairShip Documentation
docs.text:
FairShip is the simulation and reconstruction framework for the SHiP experiment.

It is based on:

  • FairRoot
  • ROOT
  • Geant4
  • Pythia8

docs.title: Quick start
docs.text: ```bash aliBuild build FairShip alienv enter FairShip/latest

docs.title: Using AliBuild (recommended)
docs.text:
```bash git clone https://github.com/alisw/alibuild.git export ALIBUILD_WORK_DIR=$HOME/ship/sw

aliBuild build FairShip
